snippet.title: Paris Transylvania Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Boundless Exploration and High Replayability!

Paris Transylvania is a vampire-slaying Pachinko Roguelike Deckbuilder with epic battles and surprises at every corner. Play as one of the unlikely heroes, conquer Transylvania and free the people! 

🍰 Come join our community for a private playtest, first-hand previews and more! https://discord.gg/zXTjQfFmYz 
💜 Wishlist and play the free demo on Steam NOW: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2459560/Paris_Transylvania/

#gaming #games #shorts #trailer #gameplay #indiedev #gamedev
